content:

inventory=[{"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 15, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 21, "index": 26}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a stone_axe, I need to first craft two sticks. To craft a stick, I need to place bamboo in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move the bamboo from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 4 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a stone_axe, I need to first craft two sticks. To craft a stick, I need to place bamboo in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move the bamboo from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a stone_axe, I need sticks and cobblestone/blackstone. The sticks are crafted from bamboo, so I will first move the bamboo from slot 44 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have already moved one piece of bamboo into the crafting grid, but I need two pieces of bamboo to craft the sticks. Therefore I will move another piece of bamboo into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 15, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 21, "index": 26}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have placed two pieces of bamboo in the crafting grid, I can craft the sticks. I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 59, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 15, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 21, "index": 26}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: I want to craft a stone_axe. The recipe for a stone_axe requires two sticks and two blackstone/cobblestone. I have one stick in slot 11, and another in slot 12. I have two cobblestones in slot 39. I will start by moving the cobblestone from slot 39 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
